headline: HTTP Echo server benchmark, Nginx(C), HTTP-echo(go), Pipy(C++)
description: We did some benchmark for basic HTTP Echo service with Nginx , http-echo and pipy. Nginx is written in C, and http-echo in golang, pipy in C++. Seams C++/ASIO based Pipy has better throughput and latency distribution. And C based Nginx has better memory usage. For extreme network performance programming, golang is not as good as C/C++ yet. Detail report here : https://github.com/flomesh-io/pipy/wiki/BENCHMARK-:-Pipy-as-Echo-server
headline_zh-Hans: HTTP回声服务器基准，Nginx(C), HTTP-echo(go), Pipy(C++)
headline_zh-Hant: HTTP回聲服務器基準，Nginx(C), HTTP-echo(go), Pipy(C++)
description_zh-Hans: 我们用Nginx、http-echo和pipy对基本的HTTP Echo服务做了一些基准测试。Nginx是用C语言编写的，而http-echo是用golang编写的，pipy是用C++编写的。看起来基于C++/ASIO的Pipy有更好的吞吐量和延迟分布。而基于C语言的Nginx有更好的内存使用。对于极端的网络性能编程，golang还不如C/C++好。详细报告在这里：https://github.com/flomesh-io/pipy/wiki/BENCHMARK-:-Pipy-as-Echo-server
description_zh-Hant: 我們用Nginx、http-echo和pipy對基本的HTTP Echo服務做了一些基準測試。Nginx是用C語言編寫的，而http-echo是用golang編寫的，pipy是用C++編寫的。看起來基於C++/ASIO的Pipy有更好的吞吐量和延遲分佈。而基於C語言的Nginx有更好的內存使用。對於極端的網絡性能編程，golang還不如C/C++好。詳細報告在這裡：https://github.com/flomesh-io/pipy/wiki/BENCHMARK-:-Pipy-as-Echo-server
